question: who is emma dating in once upon a time
api_result: As of the last update in my training data, in the TV show "Once Upon a Time," Emma Swan (played by Jennifer Morrison) ends up with Captain Hook, whose real name is Killian Jones (played by Colin O'Donoghue). Their relationship develops over the seasons, and they eventually get married in Season 6. Emma and Hook's romance is a central storyline in the later seasons of the series.
